ygData.subject: Re: Why do the melee classes keep wanting Bind?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... away from a bind point. Is it just that folks aren t aware what the bind-able zones are? Or maybe good aligned characters don t realize they can be bound
ygData.messageBody:
>All of the other zones in the world are usually only 2, sometimes 3, zones
away from a bind point. Is it just that folks aren't aware what the
bind-able zones are? Or maybe good aligned characters don't realize they can
be bound in evil cities just like good cities? Is a two zone run THAT bad?
>


Uhhhh, yeeees, theory says I can be bound in say Ogguk or grobb, but
practice says if I die in cazic it is

Arena->Lake Rathtear->Rathe Mountains->Feerot->Cazic
or
SFreeport->N-ro->Oasis->S-ro->Innothule->feerot->cazic

(btw, SolB has a direct zone to Lavastorm)

Then again I am not worried about it, I am a bard! I mostly just stay bound
in Highpass and deal with it. Zoooooom.

Tszaaz E'Taurguin
